user_query: I'm looking for a tool to analyze the content of my website. Can you provide me with the overall SEO score, errors, and warnings for the URL 'https://www.mywebsite.com'? Additionally, can you give me the meaning and synonyms of the word 'success' in Hindi?

TaskList.description: Analyze the SEO score, errors, and warnings for the specified URL.
Fetch the meaning and synonyms of the word 'success' in Hindi.
